email.subject: Important: Submit Your Voter Form to Your Election Office
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

We're glad you've been able to use the Vote-Print-Mail system to generate your Federal Write-in Absentee Ballot (FWAB) and that you can cast your vote in this important election! Please read the instruction letter carefully.

You must download, print, sign and send in your FWAB. You can check your State Requirements/ Voter Materials Transmission Options to confirm the various options for transmitting your form.

Remember to check the witness requirements and then sign your cover page form and send it with your ballot to your election official who needs your original signature.

If the ballot from your election office arrives after you have sent in your FWAB, please complete it and send it in to replace the FWAB.

Overseas Vote is an initiative of U.S. Vote Foundation, a nonprofit, nonpartisan public charity powered by a dedicated team of volunteers. Please help us reach more voters like you and - make a donation today!

Here's to you for casting your ballot!
- From the volunteer team at Overseas Vote

And please, Make your donation today!

Contact us at voterhelpdesk@usvotefoundation.org anytime with questions or comments.
